Reviews.Title: “School trip from hell.”
Reviews.Author: RachelFreitag
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel half 5 morning 7 hour bus journey available 1 oclock afternoon demanded 20 euro deposit person breakfast eventually 50 changed freshen sleep shower bathroom decor hideous 70s top stank cigarettes stated friends health asthmatic information sent hotels prior stay found staff unfriendly unhelpful terrible hotel lovely city

Reviews.Title: “Very bad and very expensive - unfriendly staff”
Reviews.Author: bobik2008
Reviews.Content: hotel located 3rd floor apartment building staff unfriendly check explain guests look cash money quick information receptionist bothered parking front hotel costs day nearly strange smell corridor check pay internet slow useful writing desk 120 eur itb daring

Reviews.Title: “A GOOD HOTEL IN A CENTRAL LOCSATYION - EXCELLENT BREAKFAST”
Reviews.Author: LYDIAANDJOHN
Reviews.Content: stayed kudam night berlin reasonable price found comet excellent hotel located clean quiet breakfast similar travelodge uk terms beautiful 1900s reception walk central station 15 minutes easily accessible platz 2 minutes walk hotel recommend

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: Nevyle
Reviews.Content: hotel clean corner ensuite facilities balcony plenty hot water downside plug sink tv little wall hairdryer plug light bathroom clean basic ceilings typical german living buffet breakfast extremely staff helpful friendly hotel bottom underground bus stop minutes walk centre berlin near zoologischer garden transport system easy remember activate rail travelcard whatever form transport card brilliant hotel berlin week weather hot
